On Jan. 10, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer sent a companywide e-mail to the effect that Bob Muglia , president of the company's Server and Tools Business, would depart his post this summer. While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools Business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Steve Ballmer wrote.`` We are now ready to build on our success and move forward into the era of cloud computing.'' Across the nation there's a feeling of defiance among politicians. They are undeterred by the violence that erupted at Gabrielle Giffords ' political event in Tucson, Ariz., on Jan. 8, 2011. I think right now she is inspiring all of us, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.).`` I think she is inspiring our nation with her courage, with her strength.'' The LA Times says, With Ellen DeGeneres leaving and Jennifer Lopez reportedly singing on as her replacement,`` American Idol has indisputably jumped the shark.''
